metadata.title: Kestrel Adventures Tully
metadata.author: RoadTrain
metadata.description:
REQUIRES MULTIVERSE TO WORK This mod replaces the sprite/text for admiral Tully, turning them into a dark skinned female in line with their depiction in the YouTube series "Kestrel Adventures". Now compatible with MV 5.2.1 (should be compatible with later versions hopefully)
Special thanks to: - Kommandant_Julk for removing all the clobbering. - MV devs for such a great mod and the Tully sprite
Changelog: 1.1 - removed clobbering - reduced file size - now no longer breaks stuff (hopefully)
1.2 - now affects storage check and (hopefully) all other mentions of Tully's gender - miniship of tully crewser (that little picture in hangar that shows a tiny version of that ship) no longer displays vanilla Tully - changed all mentions of "Brodric Tully" to "Jane Tully" - now compatible with Forgemaster mod! (until more entry texts get added)
